src:
Odpoklic sušenih fig Fruit Snack

07 Nov 2019, 14:29


Ljubljana, 7. novembra - Proizvajalec Sdokuos je iz prodaje odpoklical Fruit Snack sušene soft fige v 200-gramskem pakiranju zaradi presežene vsebnosti ohratoksina A v živilu.



Ljubljana. Proizvajalec Sdokuos je iz prodaje odpoklical Fruit Snack sušene soft fige v 200-gramskem pakiranju zaradi presežene vsebnosti ohratoksina A v živilu. Izdelki lota L200107 in rokom uporabnosti 20. januar 2020 bodo odstranjeni z vseh prodajnih polic iz varnostnih razlogov.Foto: Bimo d.o.o.

Izdelki lota L200107 in rokom uporabnosti 20. januar 2020 bodo odstranjeni z vseh prodajnih polic iz varnostnih razlogov.
Vsem kupcem izdelka se proizvajalec za neljubi dogodek opravičuje, hkrati pa poziva, da kupljeni izdelek vrnejo v trgovino, kjer so ga kupili.
text:
Recall of dried figs Fruit Snack

07 Nov 2019, 13:29


Ljubljana, November 7 - Manufacturer Sdokuos has recalled the sale of Fruit Snack dried soft figs in a 200 gram package due to the excess content of ochratoxin A in the food.



Ljubljana. Sdokuos manufacturer recalled Fruit Snack dried soft figs in a 200 gram package due to excess ochratoxin A in the food. Products of lot L200107 and expiration date January 20, 2020 will be removed from all shelves for safety reasons.Photo: We will do.o.o.

The products of lot L200107 and the expiry date of January 20, 2020 will be removed from all shelves for safety reasons.
The manufacturer apologizes to all buyers of the product for disliking the event, but at the same time calls for the product to be returned to the store where it was purchased.
